Container.Name: cleanuperr
Container.Overview:
## Introducing cleanuperr
How it works 1. Add excluded file names to prevent malicious files from being downloaded by qBittorrent. 2. cleanuperr goes through all items in Sonarr's queue at every 5th minute. 3. For each queue item, a call is made to qBittorrent to get the stats of the torrent. 4. If a torrent is found to be marked as completed, but with 0 downloaded bytes, cleanuperr calls Sonarr to add that torrent to the blocklist. 5. If any malicious torrents have been found, cleanuperr calls Sonarr to automatically search again.
## Environment variables
Multiple Sonarr/Radarr instances can be specified using this format:
SONARR__INSTANCES____URL SONARR__INSTANCES____APIKEY where starts from 0.
